org.streaminer.stream.classifier.tree

Interface QualityCriterion

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    QualityCriterion.EntropyCriterion, QualityCriterion.GiniCriterion

    public interface QualityCriterion
extends Serializable

    Interface to define a quality criterion to be used to construct the tree. Available:
    QualityCriterion.EntropyCriterion (information gain) as used by ID3
    QualityCriterion.GiniCriterion (Gini-Index) as used by CART

    Author:
    Tobias Beckers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  QualityCriterion.EntropyCriterion
      The QualityCriterion 'entropy' or 'information (gain)' as used by ID3
      static class  QualityCriterion.GiniCriterion
      The QualityCriterion 'Gini-Index' as used by CART

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static QualityCriterion GINI_INDEX 
      static QualityCriterion INFO_GAIN 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getHighestGain(int numberOfClasses)
      Returns the upper bound of gain for this quality criterion depending on the number of possible classes
      double getLowestGain()
      Returns the lower bound of gain for this quality criterion
      double getQuality(double... probabilities)
      Returns the quality for the given probabilities
      String toString()
      Returns the name of this quality criterion
